Description: Book of the Dead of Padiamennebnesuttawy son of Tasheretenmin, broken into numerous fragments, mounted in five frames, with hieratic text and vignettes in red and black.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tomb of Ankhhor (Thebes), intrusive burial
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57281) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57281)
Acquisition name: From: George Annesley, 2nd Earl of Mountnorris (?)
